attributes.background: Dubs'amendment wasto allow unaccompaniedchildren safe refugeThe Govt recognised that refugeechildren acrossEU are not safe&remain vulnerable.The amendment didnot specify howmany children willbe resettled.If each constituency offered refuge to 5 unaccompaniedminors then 3000children willbe brought in

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
